name: The Queen's Cookbook
description:
Welcome to the world of Carolina! A young Culinary Witch on an epic quest to save the queen. Save the queen from an embarrassing night that is.

The Queen's Cookbook is a point-and-click adventure game centered around Carolina. In it, the player must help Carolina collect recipes for the queen's banquet that is happening tonight. Talk to friends, help people and explore new places while working up your appetite.

For now, there's only a prototype available with the major systems of the game in place. I'll be working on this as I have the time. Let me know what you think!

You can find me at:

twitter.com/SunshineMemoir
